content: This was magnificent. I have been quietly weeping on and off for the last 24 hours… since learning my childhood icon and adulthood hero had fucking died. You just encapsulated everything I felt and continue to feel beautifully. Dear god… 2016, you have kicked the asses of women who grew up in the 70’s and 80’s beyond measure. And we have 2017 to look forward to, with the ultimate misogynist prick at the helm. In a way, it might be best Princess Leia died before the Death Star takes over. Love to all.
